sentence.Network_en: I wouldn't entertain the idea of such an unsociable job.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不会考虑从事这种不跟人打交道的工作。

sentence.Network_en: My marriage has broken up. It has made me reclusive and unsociable.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的婚姻破裂了。这让我变得孤僻、不愿与人来往。

sentence.Network_en: I am by no means an unsociable person.
sentence.Network_cn: 我绝对不是一个不合群的人。

entry.def: Someone who is unsociable does not like talking to other people and tries to avoid meeting them.

example.ex: My marriage has broken up. It has made me reclusive and unsociable...
example.tran: 我的婚姻破裂了。这让我变得孤僻、不愿与人来往。

example.ex: I am by no means an unsociable person.
example.tran: 我绝对不是一个不合群的人。

means.word_mean: 1. not inclined to society or companionship;
